thread.title: UFC 208: Germaine de Randamie becomes first women's featherweight champion - BBC Three
thread.title_full: UFC 208: Germaine de Randamie becomes first women's featherweight champion - BBC Three

title: UFC 208: Germaine de Randamie becomes first women's featherweight champion - BBC Three
text:
twitter 
Afterwards De Randamie apologised for the 'heat of the moment' punches. The first time the referee told me it was still on the buzzer. I apologise, I‚Äôm not like that. Germaine de Randamie 
De Randamie‚Äôs kickboxing prowess saw her land more than 80 headshots to Holm, who ended Ronda Rousey‚Äôs bantamweight title reign in 2015. 
Holm tried repeatedly to grapple De Randamie to the ground but failed to land any of her takedown attempts, though she rocked the kickboxer with a headkick towards the end of the third round. 
The former boxer threw more punches at De Randamie, but the new champion‚Äôs shots were more effective. 
‚ÄúShe didn‚Äôt want to fight me,‚Äù said De Randamie. ‚ÄúI hoped she was going to fight me. Holly was a tremendous champion, but I love to brawl.‚Äù Getty Images 
MMA legend Anderson Silva rolled back the years to claim an unlikely victory against Derek Brunson. 
The 41-year-old former champion, who said fighting in New York was one of his dreams, was left in tears after taking the unanimous judges decision. That's what it means for üï∑ @SpiderAnderson to get back in the win column at #UFC208 ! pic.twitter.com/8kMevLvpkx twitter 
He came into the fight on the back of two losses and a win over Nick Diaz that was overturned following a failed drugs test. 
Brunson started the fight brightly, brushing off Silva‚Äôs familiar wheel kick and landing several uppercuts while caught in the Brazilian‚Äôs clinch, but Silva gathered momentum as the fight progressed, showing signs of his trademark swagger. The Spider getting comfortable in the 2nd #UFC208 pic.twitter.com/qc6kfM1Mcz twitter 
Afterwards Brunson made clear he was unhappy with the decision by the judges. Wow unreal I put my heart & soul out there on 3 weeks notice only to get it taken from me.I just outclassed the... https://t.co/TxiZ78mj4A
